Support for funding for airport projects; Advocate for funding measures for capital needs in the FAA reauthorization (H.R. 2997/S.1405/H.R. 302).
Seeking support for federal funding for contract tower construction in the Small Airport Fund in the FY2020 appropriations legislation (no bill number).
